channel.title: Azide 317[PI] Eco-Pk 100% Working Combat-Needs Staff-Quests-Skilling 99%
channel.description:
Welcome to the official advertisement thread of Azide.
Client: https://www.dropbox.com/s/231zigbwg545lpd/Azide.jar Website: www.azidescape.weebly.com(UnderConstruction)
Please take note that i took photos from Divine-Reality What do players think of some Unique features about the client (New Orbs etc)
[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/k0rsc3.png[/img]
Welcome to Azide
NOTE: 2X EXP + 2X PKP FOR FIRST 2 WEEKS!
Why choose us?
We offer a great variety of different tasks. Something new to do. We listen to Suggestions and add them if they seem willingly to benefit the server. We have dedicated Developers to keep you happy.
We stride to keep the server as enjoyable for players. We don't want no one bored and leaving us!. We are always thinking of new ways to attract you!
What we have?
Dedicated SERVER 4GB Ram Flawless Combat system! A clean 317 Server with features like Castlewars! ZERO Lag Recoloured Whips/Santas/P Hats/Hwee'ns Added! Auth Vote System Great uptime Levelling up system with REWARDS! Pest control with NPCS! Amazing Bosses to choose from Amazing Economy Hunter skill; Slayer System with rewards PK system with Rewards Clipped following + Npc Clipping Dedicated Developers Friendly Owner+Staff Donator Benefits Amazing skills (all work) Quests! Cook Assistant Dragon Slayer Desert Treasure All 3 Magic spells work! Great Prayer system Great Combat + PVM
Great Economy. 8 Quests!
More images [img]http://i911.photobucket.com/albums/ac319/wtfispk/22online_zpse5019d94.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/ilal8j.png[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2nu0qjl.png[/img] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/auhbb6.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2j0kxoi.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/3462d7c.png[/img] [img]http://i911.photobucket.com/albums/ac319/wtfispk/Training2.png[/img] [img]http://i911.photobucket.com/albums/ac319/wtfispk/Training.png[/img] [img]http://i911.photobucket.com/albums/ac319/wtfispk/Godwars.png[/img] [img]http://i911.photobucket.com/albums/ac319/wtfispk/Barrelchest.png[/img] [img]http://i911.photobucket.com/albums/ac319/wtfispk/donor.png[/img] [img]http://i911.photobucket.com/albums/ac319/wtfispk/Pestcontrol.png[/img] [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/acyeef.png[/img] [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/2d2fzuo.png[/img]
